name: The Legend of Tine, Craffel kriegt auf die Waffel
name_original: The Legend of Tine, Craffel kriegt auf die Waffel
description:
This game was a secret santa gift to the german Twitch streamer Craffel.

In this game you play Craffel him self in a cute Jump & Run with some Stream insider Jokes. Currently all dialogues are only available in German.
